Name: Oberon Confederation
Details: One of the most successful and troublesome bandit kingdoms, the Oberon Confederation is located in the Coreward Periphery, close both to the Draconis Combine and the Lyran Commonwealth. The current version of the Confederation was founded in 3012 by bandit king Hendrik Grimm III, who has been working to turn the pirate realm into a protostate, although House Oberon is still known by its piracy raids and brutality towards POWs.
